data.eml:eml: Morphological and genetic analysis of Milnesium cf. granulatum (Tardigrada: Milnesiidae) from Northeastern North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jackson, Kathy Jo A., Meyer, Harry A. (2019): Morphological and genetic analysis of Milnesium cf. granulatum (Tardigrada: Milnesiidae) from Northeastern North America. Zootaxa 4604 (3): 497-510, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.3.6
